软件包 org.opengoss.web.core

Web Core to provide interfaces for web server, container and web plugin.

请参见：
          描述

接口摘要
IWebContainer Web application container.
IWebPlugin Web plugins are parts of a web application.
IWebServer Web server is a service that starts a HTTP server and a servlet container.
IWebServerConfig Web server configurations including HTTP server port, thread pool etc.
 

类摘要
WebPlugin Default IWebPlugin implementation.
WebPluginActivator Web plugin activator.
 

软件包 org.opengoss.web.core 的描述

Web Core to provide interfaces for web server, container and web plugin. A web plugin is activated by WebPluginActivator

概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助
